item.description:
Tides at Portsmouth Harbor:

High - 8:23 am

Low - 2:13 pm

We'll launch at Pierce Island Boat Launch (located just across the bridge from Presscott Park in Downtown Portsmouth) and circumnavigate Newcastle in a clockwise direction. We will stop and take a lunch break in Little Harbor, on the beach at Odiorne Point State Park. Then we will return to Pierce Island through the scenic back channel. This paddle will be approximately 8 miles in length.

There is a $5.00 Fee to launch at Pierce Island.

This is a level 3 paddle and is restricted to kayaks 12' or more in length with watertight bulkheads or flotation bags. Expect to be paddling in Wind, Strong Currents, Waves, and Swell. There is a strong possibility of boat traffic as well.

Lifejackets (PFD's) are required when paddling with this group.

All participants should have some experience with self and assisted rescue techniques, coastal paddling, and paddling in moderate currents.

Click Here For Directions Using Google Maps

The GPS Coordinates for the Pierce Island Boat Launch: N43 04.458 - W70 44.897
item.name: Newcastle Island Circumnavigation
